text: Eaba o qala ho phenya-phenya mekotla ea bona pele a phenya oa moena’e, a e fumana ho moena’e. Ke kamoo Re ileng Ra qapela Josefa. O ne a ke ke a nka moena’e ho latela molao oa motlotlehi kantle le haeba e ne e le thato ea Allah. Re phahamisa ka mohau eo Re ikhethelang eena ho latela maemo, har’a marena a nang le Tsebo ho teng e mong ea Tsebang Tsohle
